idea:
My vision is to empower the homemaker women of India. Every homemaker in India at times feel the need to be financially independent, however they feel they do not have any skill to do so. Well they all forget the one skill they all have and they are great at it. i.e Cooking and organisation. 


I want to build an app, a website which brings together all these women who would like get some financial return through their skill while adding value to their customers.


A customer ( Referred as I)( GenZ, millennial ) who is busy and thriving in life, sometimes do not have time to cook or organise their home. Even if they do take out time they are not necessarily good at it.  


Case 1 - I feel like eating Undhiyu today, I wish I get authentic undhiyu delivered to me at home.  I also that home made methi laddoos for winter, can someone make them to order fresh and tasty. 


we have a solution here - There is always a special dish a homemaker is known for . " Yaar mummy ke haath ki  'puranpoli' best hoti hai. 'Aunty ke haath ka 'rasgulla' is too good.' 


So our app allows you to register with your 3 best dishes that you are good at, known for and can deliver on order. This can vary anywhere from daal to kadi to ladoos to kheer. 


Just look for availability and options in your area via our map. Check reviews ratings and order. All our providers are verified and checked for home basic necessities, hygiene.


You get authentic taste - freshly made  and delivered same day. And the best part is every time you order from GharoGhari you are supporting a homemaker. The pillars of our home, society and country. 


This will make them financially independent through the skill they have and we get what we always want - Yum food 


In phase 2 I plan to expand it to organisation service as well, organisation from kitchen, wardrobe, book shelf just name it. At your service.
name: GharoGhari

idea:
we have developed a very unique business model wherein the Indian FOREX outflow can be greatly reduced, thus reducing the CAD ( current account deficit) and ultimately increasing the GDP of India. ( as we save over 20 to 40 lac crores of Forex outflow overall in five years- Rupees twenty upto forty lac crores of forex outflow savings to the exchequer of India). We have started successfully a prototype branch /center and have got much success in Mumbai.

This concept in brief is -
 it is a diagnostic center which provides the analysis and certification of the particular
 elements contents alongwith its purity percentage, using the MRI technology. We have been able to solve our nations deep problem in this sector, which will be helpful to all our 120 crore + people of India, who have no choice but to keep blind faith (so, they are getting cheated regularly with no solution till date). It provides jobs for over 14000 people upon our business being scaled pan India, as we seek to have 1000 - 1200 such diagnostics centers all over India in tier i, ii, and iii cities. There is no competition in this sector as such ondate. We seek incubator/venture capital of 5 to 10 crores to take it forward successfully, Please help us to help India bring up its GDP. We seek your support and assistance in taking this project forward pan India. I request a ten minutes meeting with you, as there is a very very important message which i cannot disclose
 here. I am now 59 years of age, and this is my lifetime effort of research, I wish to hand over to my nation.

Sirji will you help?
Please help us to help India bring up its GDP.
Will appreciate your kind response soon.

Thanks and regards B Kumar ( mobile - 9820020758)
Krrish capital corp
2 Apeejay house
 130 B S Marg
Mumbai:-400023.
